title: NDTV Reports From Israel Airport As Sirens Blare After Attack On Iran
summary_full: NDTV's Aditya Raj Kaul was reporting live from Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion Airport when the air raid warnings began blaring across the city.
summary_public: NDTV's Aditya Raj Kaul was reporting live from Tel Aviv's Ben Gurion Airport when the air raid warnings began blaring across the city.
